name: Name
text_about_me_1: My first encounter with programming was with basic HTML and CSS, even without exactly knowing what I was doing, but I loved creating my own website.
text_about_me_2: I started my Computer Science degree at UNIFESO, where I truly got to know programming, logic, and best practices for website development.
text_about_me_3: The college provided me with opportunities and paved the way for me to enter the programming field, where I started as an intern at Noclaf.
text_about_me_4: I graduated from university and presented my final thesis, in which I developed an augmented reality website using Three.js to display 3D models.
text_about_me_5: I have over 4 years' experience in Angular and have worked with various technologies. I've recently started studying Django to expand my Back End knowledge.
contact_success: Letter sent! Now just wait for the reply.
contact_error: Oops, looks like something went wrong with the shipment. Try again!
